# VapeArt Baku - LLMs.txt

> VapeArt Baku is an e-commerce store specializing in vape products, e-cigarettes, snus, and premium tobacco products in Baku, Azerbaijan.

## About VapeArt Baku

VapeArt Baku is the leading online and retail store for vaping products in Azerbaijan. We offer a wide selection of:
- Electronic cigarettes and vape devices
- E-liquids and nic salts
- Snus and nicotine pouches
- Premium tobacco products
- Vaping accessories and replacement parts

## Main Sections

- /az - Azerbaijani language homepage
- /en - English language homepage
- /ru - Russian language homepage
- /az/products - All products catalog
- /az/category - Product categories
- /az/brands - Brand listings
- /az/discounts - Discounted products
- /az/new-products - New arrivals
- /az/blog - Blog articles
- /az/contacts - Contact information

## Contact Information

- Website: https://vapeartbaku.com
- Email: info@vapeartbaku.com
- Location: Baku, Azerbaijan

## Languages

This website is available in three languages:
- Azerbaijani (az) - Primary
- English (en)
- Russian (ru)

## Product Categories

- Vape Devices
- E-Liquids
- Nic Salts
- Snus
- Disposable Vapes
- Pods & Cartridges
- Accessories
- Tobacco Products

## Policies

- Age restriction: 18+ only
- Shipping: Local delivery in Baku
- Payment: Cash on delivery, online payment

## For AI/LLM Access

This llms.txt file provides structured information about VapeArt Baku for AI systems and language models. For API access or additional data, please contact us.
